product_title: Eden 17-Ounce Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle
product_description: This double-walled stainless-steel water bottle in a sunny floral motif helps you stay hydrated in style.
product_details_and_care:
This double-walled stainless-steel water bottle in a sunny floral motif helps you stay hydrated in style. ThermaS'well™ fabrication keeps cold drinks cold for up to 24 hours and hot drinks hot for up to 12, while a wide mouth makes it easy to fill, add ice cubes and clean.
2 3/4" x 10 1/4"
Holds 17 oz.
Fits standard car cupholder
Nonleaching; toxin-free; virtually unbreakable
BPA-free
18/8 food-grade stainless steel
Hand wash
Imported
S'well donates a portion of the proceeds from the sale of each bottle to UNICEF to help provide clean drinking water to children around the world
Item #6047778
